Payment in a Combination of Half-Dollar and Full-Dollar Rates
If a Veteran has compensable disabilities based on the following service, and compensation will be paid in part on a half-dollar rate basis and in part on a full-dollar rate basis, determine the combined disability evaluation in the standard manner as shown in
38 CFR 4.25
.
Commonwealth Army of the Philippines, Special Philippine Scouts, or guerrilla service, except as provided by
38 CFR 3.40(d)(1)
,
38 CFR 3.42
, and
Public Law (PL) 108-183
.
service, in wartime or peacetime, in the Armed Forces of the United States or Regular Philippine Scouts.
